body:
The subtle point (and it __is___ subtle, and easily missed) is that generated files are meant to be starting points, reflecting the preferences and values of the core team, but ones that can be changed.  And that people do change them.  And specify options like --skip-bundle (see https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/fc3a39b599fbbed86a153b9742258db020eefa3c).

Netting this all out: Rails doesn't depend on bundler, but apps by default do.  The current docs for assets don't presume that every application will use the defaults.  The proposal is to change this assumption.

Perhaps this assumption should be reexamined.  But not because "Rails 4 relies on bundler".
